thread.title: Sainsbury’s shopper’s heartfelt thank you to stranger who gave her a comfort hug during child’s supermarket tantrum
thread.title_full: Sainsbury’s shopper’s heartfelt thank you to stranger who gave her a comfort hug during child’s supermarket tantrum

author: jshammas
title: Sainsbury’s shopper’s heartfelt thank you to stranger who gave her a comfort hug during child’s supermarket tantrum
text:
Opinion 'WE'VE ALL BEEN THERE' Sainsbury’s shopper’s heartfelt thank you to stranger who gave her a comfort hug during child’s supermarket tantrum 
The mum said she was telling off her daughter when a lady came up to her, put her hand on her shoulder, and gave her a "big hug" BY JOHN SHAMMAS
